skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
The Luxin skill, allows you to control your Luxin connected devices, including lights, plugs, dimmers, RGB controllers, IR transmitters, Curtains, and RF transmitters with your voice. Also, You can Import your Scenes too.

Note that not all functionalities are supported.

To get started, go to your Luxin App, enter hub settings, add Alexa Voice Assistant.
After that, you can enable this skill and link your Luxin account with your Amazon account.

Lights, Switches, and Plugs:
- "Alexa, turn off the bathroom"
- "Alexa, turn on ceiling light"
- "Alexa, turn off the toaster"

Dimmers and RGB controllers:
- "Alexa, make the bedroom green"
- "Alexa, dim the kitchen"
- "Alexa, set the master bedroom on 70%"

Curtains:
- "Alexa, open the shade"
- "Alexa, close the projector screen"

Scenes:
- "Alexa, activate I'm home"
- "Alexa, turn on presentation scene"
